        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reading Cards -No 17;The Four Minute Mile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lesekarten - Kein 17;The Vier Minuziöse Meile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cartes de Lecture - Aucun 17;The Quatre Mille 
Minute</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cartões Da Leitura - Nenhum 17;The Quatro Milha 
Minuciosa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Schedi Della Lettura - Nessun 17;The Quattro 
Miglio Minuto</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάρτες ανάγνωσης - αριθ. 17;The τέσσερα μικρό μίλι</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tarjetas De la Lectura - Ningún 17;The Cuatro 
Milla Minuciosa</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This is a reading comprehension and writing assignment based on a passage about Robert Bannister.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">queries</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses ist eine Leseerfassen- und 
-schreibensanweisung, die auf einem Durchgang über Robert Bannister 
basiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">C'est une affectation de compréhension et 
d'écriture de lecture basée sur un passage au sujet de rampe de 
Robert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta é uma atribuição da compreensão e da 
escrita da leitura baseada em uma passagem sobre o bannister de 
Robert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ciò è un'assegnazione di comprensione e di 
scrittura della lettura basata su un passaggio circa il bannister del 
Robert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό είναι μια ανάθεση κατανόησης και γραψίματος 
ανάγνωσης βασισμένη σε μια μετάβαση για Robert Bannister.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esto es una asignación de la comprensión y de 
la escritura de la lectura basada en un paso sobre la barandilla de 
Roberto.</string>
          </description>

          </keyword>
